content: double_crochet mobius fidget by laura gilkey foxinthestars@gmail com supplies any desired yarn matching crochet hook stitch marker chain 16 working in back bumps single_crochet in second chain from hook place marker in single_crochet just made continue and single_crochet in each chain across 15 scs bring the ends of the row together as though to form a ring then turn the free end over once so that the marker is on the bottom this will form a mobius strip working into the bottom of the beginning chain starting with the st across from the marker shortwise single_crochet 15 you should come to a gap with the marker on the other side and the beginning tail at the base of the last stitch worked single_crochet around the beginning tail and into the marked stitch to close the gap removing the marker this should maintain the mobius strip continue working around the beginning tail to bury it as you go single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 3 this forms a ramp to smooth the transition to dcs so you don t have to join rounds afterward begin pattern stitch double_crochet 1 2 double_crochet in next st repeat pattern stitch until piece reaches desired size half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 3 slip_stitch fasten_off weave in end enjoy or give generously many thanks to penny donna and lois of lake area fiber arts guild - https //www lakefiberarts com/ and to the designers behind the following tutorials lisa of less-waste co uk hyperbolic mobius - https //www less-waste co uk/yarn-scrap-hyperbolic-mobius/ maak het met miranda - made with miranda workshops at youtube miranda s magic fidget - https //youtu be/w4uzqqsrjri designer s note you may sell items you make from this pattern or do whatever else you like with them you may also use this pattern to teach classes and distribute copies to the students otherwise please do not redistribute the pattern itself please link to the source you can contact me through ravelry id foxbrushstudio
